name: Space Throwback!
description:
this is my 2D shooter project.

modifications are:

1) new levels, all different (fighting off a swarm, fighting a boss, and escaping the asteroids).

2) new playersprite, new backgrounds, new music (thanks to BloodPixel for the tunes).

3) new monster, the boss.

made by Egor K.
music by BloodPixel.

sounds by many people from Freesound.org
